result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cortez Antonio Jones

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Cortez Antonio Jones in court, in custody.  Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court for Cortez Antonio Jones.  Attorney Chad Wozniak appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Final PreTrial. Discussion placed on the record. State provided update to the court regarding DNA and Ballistic reports. State requests an adjournment to allow time to receive and review reports. Defense does not object. State advised the Court, of ongoing negotiations with possible resolution. Court ordered case adjourned for Status Conference hearing. Court ordered Jury Trial scheduled October 10, 2022 VACATED. Case remains calendared in Branch 45. 

Status Conference hearing scheduled for November 15, 2022 at 8:30 am. Hearing will be held in Room G55 of the Criminal Justice Facility.

Defendant Cortez Antonio Jones not in court, in custody.  Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court for Cortez Antonio Jones.  Assistant District Attorney Chad Wozniak in court for State of Wisconsin. Held off the record. Case set for final pre trial.   State request an adjournment due to being in trial in another court. For reasons presented to the Court. Case adjourned in Br 45.  mn
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 11:00 am.
DNA Notice of Intent to Use_2 - Jones, Cortez Antonio.pdf, Filed.

Defendant Cortez Antonio Jones not in court, in custody.  Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court for Cortez Antonio Jones.  Prosecuting attorney Jessica Bellows in court for the State of Wisconsin for Chad Wozniak.  ADA Wozniak in trial and unable to appear in the court.  Court will adjourn this matter for an additional final pretrial in Br 45.  mn
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant's Motion to Dismiss.  (Cortez A. Jones - #2022005015, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
Cortez Jones 22CF001610 Defendant's List of Witnesses, Filed.
Cortez Jones 22CF001610 Defendant's List of Proposed Jury Instructions, Filed.

Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court, defendant Cortez Antonio Jones not in court, in custody.  Jennifer Jean Tate appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant in quarantine and not allowed to appear in court.  Appearance waived.  This matter is adjourned for final pretial in Br 45.  Court ordered all trial documents must be filed 48 hours prior to jury trial date.   mn  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.
All parties are notified that effective July 30, 2022, this case will be assigned to Judge Jean Kies, Br 45, room 502 SB

Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court, defendant Cortez Antonio Jones not in court, in custody, CJF; appearance waived.  Jennifer Jean Tate appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Status conference scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 08:45 am.  Jury trial scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Cortez Antonio Jones in court with Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson; both appear by video.  Defendant Cortez Antonio Jones in custody.  Paul Tiffin appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detective M. Fedel. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 34.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Cortez Antonio Jones not in court, in custody. Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court  in person.  Jennifer Jean Tate appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness present. Attorney Anderson is in trial. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Cortez Antonio Jones not in court, defendant in custody.  John Daniel Flynn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in court for preliminary hearing. OPD needs additional time to appoint an attorney. Court adjourns case for an attorney to be appointed. Court finds good CAUSE to adjourn preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Cortez Antonio Jones in court with attorney Colleen Cullen.  Defendant Cortez Antonio Jones in custody.  Matthew Richard Westphal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cortez Antonio Jones appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Yamahiro, Branch 34.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
